actions.committee: House Committee on Science and Technology
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Science and Technology.

official_title: A bill to repeal the Metric Conversion Act of 1975 and to amend the declaration of purposes of the Metric Education Act of 1978.

summary.text: Repeals the Metric Conversion Act of 1975 which established the United States Metric Board to coordinate the voluntary conversion to the metric system. Amends the declaration of purpose of the Metric Education Act of 1978.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the Metric Conversion Act of 1975 and to amend the declaration of purposes of the Metric Education Act of 1978.
